name: Radish Rescue
description:
Plot

You play as a farmer who has been robbed for all of his radishes by the local dungeon monsters. Your goal is to collect all of the stolen radishes from the dungeon

Controls

WASD - movement

Left-click - attack. (Only available if you have the necessary upgrades)

Hold Left-click - show indicator for attack direction

Hold Space - dash (Only available if you have the necessary upgrades)

Gameplay

There are 3 rooms in the dungeon with doors that require a certain amount of radishes to be unlocked.

In the dungeon you can find 4 different upgrades:

  • Health - gives you an extra hit point
  • Dash - gives you the ability to dash while holding shift for a limited amount of time

  • Windblast - gives you the ability to shoot gusts of wind to push back enemies

  • Fireball - gives you the ability to shoot fireballs to kill enemies

There are 3 enemy types:

  • Slime - damages player on touch. Moves back and forth between walls

  • Ghost - Chases the player. Does damage on touch

  • Bomber - Tries to get close to the player before exploding into pellets
